summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Tracts 6 to 10, inclusive, Blocks 2 and 4, Pleasant Valley Garden Tracts; Lots 1 to 4, inclusive, Magnolia Vista Addition; Lots 1 to 5, inclusive, Block 1 Caley's Addition; Lots 1 to 4, inclusive, Block 1 and Lot 11, Block 2, Magnolia Terrace Addition; and an unplatted tract of land being that portion of the west 120 feet of the Northwest Quarter of the Northwest Quarter of Section 23, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W. M., lying between the north line of Magnolia Terrace Addition and the production west of the north line of Sunset Rim Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-67 and 17-41, respectively, as follows:
